DataElement.preferredDefinition: the phase or stage of a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the phase or stage of a clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

Property.preferredDefinition: A distinguishable part, a stage in a series of events or in a process of development, e.g. any of the varying aspects or stages in course of a disease; a fraction of a cycle.

Concepts.definition: A distinguishable part, a stage in a series of events or in a process of development, e.g. any of the varying aspects or stages in course of a disease; a fraction of a cycle.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the status or level of the phase of a clinical trial.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Assesses the drug's safety and toxicity

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Assesses the drug's safety and toxicity
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Assesses the drug's safety and toxicity

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Combination trials designed primarily to test safety, but which have a secondary objective to determine if there is any activity of the drug in the diseases that the clinical trial participants have

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Combination trials designed primarily to test safety, but which have a secondary objective to determine if there is any activity of the drug in the diseases that the clinical trial participants have
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Combination trials designed primarily to test safety, but which have a secondary objective to determine if there is any activity of the drug in the diseases that the clinical trial participants have

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Tests the activity of an agent in a set of diseases

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tests the activity of an agent in a set of diseases
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Tests the activity of an agent in a set of diseases

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Continues testing on a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market. A large number of patients are involved to ensure the validity o

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Continues testing on a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market. A large number of patients are involved to ensure the validity o
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Continues testing on a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market. A large number of patients are involved to ensure the validity of the study findings.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Small studies to determine the feasibility of an idea, concept or utilization of a drug.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Small studies to determine the feasibility of an idea, concept or utilization of a drug.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Small studies to determine the feasibility of an idea, concept or utilization of a drug.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Post-marketing studies to delineate additional information including the drug's risks, benefits, and optimal use.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Post-marketing studies to delineate additional information including the drug's risks, benefits, and optimal use.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Post-marketing studies to delineate additional information including the drug's risks, benefits, and optimal use.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Combination testing ivolving a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Combination testing ivolving a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Combination testing ivolving a larger scale across several thousand patients over several years. These are comparative trials to test if an agent is superior to other agents currently on the market.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Pre-clinical studies involving in vitro (i.e., test tube or laboratory) studies and trials on animal populations.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Pre-clinical studies involving in vitro (i.e., test tube or laboratory) studies and trials on animal populations.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pre-clinical studies involving in vitro (i.e., test tube or laboratory) studies and trials on animal populations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Status; a condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Source
ReferenceDocuments.description: Data element and all values comply with Clinical Data Update System (CDUS) v3.0 Release 2
